Job Title: Rapid Software Development Engineer, Intern - Full Stack Web (India, Remote)
Responsibilities: Rapid Prototyping & Development: Quickly develop and deploy functional web applications and server-side components using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, React, Next.js, and Node.js and related technologies.
Required Skills & Qualifications: Essential Web Development: Strong proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and TypeScript.
Frontend Frameworks: Experience with React and Next.js and related technologies.
Integration: Comfortable integrating with external systems and services, including third-party APIs and data sources.
Backend Development: Comfortable developing server-side applications using Node.js (JavaScript/TypeScript).
Knowledge of web development security best practices.
